overview: The legendary Zeb Atlas stars as The Boyfriend, a man on a quest for an ideal lover. Zeb's sensual journey will take you from a lustful hike in the desert to sun-filled romp in a Vegas suite, culminating in a final test of sexual prowess you won't believe. Which man will Zeb pick? Will it be fellow muscleman Skye Woods, adventurous wild buck Adam Killian, or innocent youth Casey Daniels? Who will Zeb pick to be his boyfriend?
title: The Boyfriend
